#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,l,countr,c,flag;
    cin>>t;
    while( t != 0)
    {
           t--;
           cin>>n>>l;
           int word;
            word = 1;
                  if(word == l)
                   word = l+1;  
                   countr = 1;
           
           
           while(countr != n)
           {
                    word++;
                    c = word;flag = 0;
                    while( c != 0)
                    {
                           if(c%10 == l)
                           {
                                   flag = 1;
                                   break;
                                   }
                                   c /= 10;
                                   }
                                   if(flag == 0)
                                   {
                                           countr++;
                                           continue;
                                           }
                                           }
                                           cout<<word<<"\n";
                                           }
                                          // getch();
                                           }
